title: Alternate Entry: Creating a new entry - missing phone number
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And you click on 'AltEntry' at the top
And choose a short code
And enter a campaign keyword
And leave the phone number empty
And click the 'Submit' button
custom_expected: Then on this for you will see a 'Please enter Phone Number' in red text

title: Alternate Entry: Creating a new entry -  missing campaign keyword
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And you click on 'AltEntry' at the top
And choose a short code
And enter a campaign a phone number
And leave campaign keyword empty
And click the 'Submit' button
custom_expected: Then there will red text 'Please enter a Keyword'

title: Alternate Entry: Create successful new entry
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click 'AltEntry' at the top
And fill out the form properly
custom_expected:
Then you will see the confirmation message:

"The Alternate Entry was submitted successfully."

title: FAQ: FAQ loads properly
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click on 'FAQ' at the top
custom_expected: Then the FAQ page will load properly

title: FAQ: Clicking on quick links will bring you to the corresponding article
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And clicked 'FAQ' at the top
And click on a link
custom_expected: Then you will be brought to the corresponding article

title: Audit Trail: Clicking on calender
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When are logged into campaign manager
And click 'Audit Trail'
And click on the calender

title: Audit Trail: Clicking on a date in the calender will populate that date in the form
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click on 'Audit Trail'
And click on the calender
And click on a date in that calender
custom_expected: Then the date you selected will populate in the form

title: Audit Trail: Successfully generating a audit trail query
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And the user has access to audit trail
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on the audit trail link at the top
And click the calender 
And select a date
And click submit
custom_expected: Then you will see the things that were modified on that date

title: User Management: Create user - missing name
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click on 'User Management' at the top
And leave 'Name' field empty
And fill in the rest of the form
And click the 'Submit' button
custom_expected: Then you will see in red text 'Name cannot be empty' next to name

title: User Management: Create user - name less than 4 or more than 50
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on User Management at the top
And in the name field enter a name that is less than 4 letters
And click Submit
custom_expected:
Then you will see a red text error:

"Name should be of 4-50 character in length."

**repeat steps and enter a name with more than 50 characters**
**this can be repeated with 'Login Name' field as well**

title: User Management: Create user - missing login name
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And clicked on 'User management' at the top
And leave 'Login Name' empty
And fill in the rest of the form
And click the 'Submit' button
custom_expected: Then you will see in red text 'Login name cannot be empty' next to 'Login Name'

title: User Management: Create user - missing password
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign mananger
And click 'User Management' at the top
And leave password field empty
And fill in the rest of the form
And click on the 'Submit' button
custom_expected: Then you will see in red text 'Password cannot be empty' next to 'Password'

title: User Management: Create user - missing email address
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign mananger
And click 'User Management' at the top
And leave email field empty
And fill in the rest of the form
And click on the 'Submit' button
custom_expected: Then you will see in red text 'Email cannot be empty' next to email address

title: User Management: Create user successfully
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on 'User Management'
And fill all the necessary fields
And click the 'Submit' button
custom_expected:
Then a new user will be created
And to check tap on 'Update an Existing User' radio button
And see the new user

title: User Management: Edit user - Update password
custom_preconds: Given you are logged into campaign manager
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click 'User Management' at the top
And click the radio button 'Update an Existing User'
And click the 'Edit User' button of user
And update the password field
And click the 'Update' button
custom_expected:
Then the password will be updated
And you should be able to login with the updated credentials

title: User Management: Showing created users
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And the user you log in with has created multiple users
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on the 'User Management' link at the top
And select the 'Update an Existing User' radio button
custom_expected: Then right underneath will popup a section that lists the users that the user has created

title: User Management: Deleting User
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And that user has permission to user management page
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on the user management link at the top
And click on update user radio button
And click delete button next to the user you wish to delete
And click 'ok' on the confirmation page
custom_expected: Then the user selected to be deleted will no longer show
